example.en: People used to think that only humans could use language.
example.vi: Mọi người thường nghĩ rằng chỉ có con người mới có thể sử dụng ngôn nghĩ.

example.en: The humans we are today are not the humans we will be then.

example.en: Language as we know is a human invention.

example.en: Because that robot had more humanity than most of us.

example.en: They don't seem to suffer from the same fear of heights that humans do.
